name: Kenfuse.com
description:
Kenfuse  (http://www.kenfuse.com) is a collaboration platform for open source project developers & students to connect and learn. 

A bootstrapped rapid co-learning process primed to help software engineering students and junior developers learn the basics of technology, get involved with open source projects, develop familiarity with processes and etiquettes of open source community, under the mentorship of open source project leads. To find out more about Kenfuse, visit FAQ at http://www.kenfuse.com/content/frequently-asked-questions
